paragraphs.text: Another vulnerable human being, a thinking reed
paragraphs.author: K

paragraphs.text: Two roads diverged in a wood, and Iâ€” I took the one less traveled by, And that has made all the difference.
paragraphs.author: Robert Frost

paragraphs.text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven't found it yet, keep looking. Don't settle.
paragraphs.author: Steve Jobs

paragraphs.text: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken. To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that is all.
paragraphs.author: Oscar Wilde

paragraphs.text: In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on. Tomorrow is a new day; begin it well.
paragraphs.author: Robert Frost
